amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE IX--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS SEC. 901. None of the funds made available in this Act (including funds made available in title IV or VIII) may be used for a project for Barracks Row Main Street, Inc.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for a project for Barracks Row Main Street, Inc.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 361 (Roll no. 591).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 361 (Roll no. 591).
